md:
giải nghĩa từ "financially" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

1. Financially (adverb)
	* Meaning: In a financial manner; with regard to money.
	* Vietnamese: Về mặt tài chính; liên quan đến tiền bạc.
	* Example sentence: The company is doing financially well this year.
	* Related words: financially, financially stable, financially independent.
	* Antonyms: unfinancially, financially struggling.

2. Financially (adverb)
	* Meaning: In a way that is related to finance or money.
	* Vietnamese: Theo cách liên quan đến tài chính hoặc tiền bạc.
	* Example sentence: The government is financially supporting the project.
	* Related words: financially, financial support, financial aid.
	* Antonyms: non-financially, financially unsupported.

Note: The word "financially" can have different meanings depending on the context in which it is used. The above explanations are two possible meanings of the word.
html:

  1. Financially (adverb)

  2. Financially (adverb)

    • Vietnamese: Theo cách liên quan đến tài chính hoặc tiền bạc.
    • Example sentence: The government is financially supporting the project.
    • Related words: financially, financial support, financial aid.
    • Antonyms: non-financially, financially unsupported.

Note: The word "financially" can have different meanings depending on the context in which it is used. The above explanations are two possible meanings of the word.
